RawLine: TNPC_60002002,{name}立刻凝聚丹田中的內力慢慢地傳輸給小兄弟，貫通全身十二經脈{p}運氣療傷調息。,{name}立刻凝聚丹田中的内力慢慢地传输给小兄弟，贯通全身十二经脉{p}运气疗伤调息。

Items.mt: <name>I immediately gathered the internal force in the dantian and slowly transmitted it to the little brother, running through the twelve meridians of the body to heal his injuries.
